page.description: The A5_RUN_EMMJ() function displays the Choose Maintenance Job dialog, which allows you to select and run a saved Netmailer maintenance job.

argument.name: Table_Set_Name
argument.description: The name of a table or set containing a Netmailer maintenance job.

section.note: Netmailer is sold as an add-in to Alpha Anywhere. *[extlink:Contact sales@https://server.alphasoftware.com/alpha-software-contact-sales]* at Alpha Software for more information.
